top_comments.comment: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!
bit late but have a look at a kitchen working triangle

comments_since_last_sample.body: I think you should get a gas cook top

I would've done two islands with the sink on one and the stove on the other, both facing out. I also would've added a pot filler.
Push to open with soft close sounds great.
14:42 I used to use push opening blum adaptors for drawers in my projects. They are very well made with good performance and long lifespan. Use them.
